case.title: GET public crocodiles check response body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/public/crocodiles/" in Postman
When user executes GET request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive list of all public crocodiles

case.title: GET public crocodiles with attached body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/public/crocodiles/" in Postman
And user attaches body of JSON format with the following value: " {Ivelina} "
When user executes GET request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive list of all public crocodiles

case.title: GET public crocodiles check response code

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/public/crocodiles/" in Postman
When user executes GET request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive response code 200

case.title: POST register a new user check response body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/user/register/" in Postman
When user executes POST request to the given endpoint

case.title: POST register a new user check response code

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/user/register/" in Postman
When user executes POST request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive response code "400 Bad Request"

case.title: POST register a new user with attached body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/user/register/" in Postman
And user attaches body of JSON format with the following value: " { "username": "Aguaphor", "password": "w@ter" } "
When user executes POST request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive the following value: " { "username": "Aguaphor", "first_name": "", "last_name": "", "email": "" } "
And response body should be "201 Created"

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/auth/cookie/login/" in Postman

case.title: POST Cookie/Session based authentication login with attached body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/auth/cookie/login/" in Postman
And user attaches body of JSON format with the following value: " { "username": "Aguaphor", "password": "w@ter" } "
When user executes POST request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive the following value: " { "id": 676661, "username": "Aguaphor", "first_name": "", "last_name": "", "email": "", "date_joined": "2023-03-13T10:56:46.174250Z" } "
And response body should be "200 OK"

When user executes POST request to the given endpoint
And response body should be "400 Bad Request"

case.title: POST Bearer/JWT token auth with attached body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/auth/token/login/" in Postman
And user attaches body of JSON format with the following value: " { "username": "Aguaphor", "password": "w@ter" } "
When user executes POST request to the given endpoint

Then user should receive the following value: " { "refresh": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoicmVmcmVzaCIsImV4cCI6MTY3ODc5MzA4OSwianRpIjoiNmQ0NzA4ODI1M2ZjNDU3ODkyMWEzMGEzMjczNTc0MGEiLCJ1c2VyX2lkIjo2NzY2NjF9.fKmvwssKhclYrBb8pZ4Ud5IjWQDzdQcU6pd5tWyT6lo", "access": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoiYWNjZXNzIiwiZXhwIjoxNjc4NzA2OTg5LCJqdGkiOiJmNTVmNzdmOGI5YWE0MmUzYWYwMjRhODI3YTI0ZTdjYiIsInVzZXJfaWQiOjY3NjY2MX0.d-e1vT0nxdwnGxfuAef_KYKs48iKZCf7ulgaetb-0Ns" } "
And response body should be "200 OK"

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/my/crocodiles/12282059" in Postman
When user executes GET request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive date for the crocodile with id "12282059"
And respose code should be "200 OK"

case.title: POST Create a new crocodile check response body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/my/crocodiles/" in Postman
When user executes POST request to the given endpoint
And respose code should be "400Bad Request"

case.title: POST Create a new crocodile with attached body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/my/crocodiles/" in Postman
And user attaches body of JSON format with the following value: " { "name": "Cookie", "sex": "M", "date_of_birth": "1998-10-02" } "
When user executes POST request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive the following value: " { "id": 12282058, "name": "Cookie", "sex": "M", "date_of_birth": "1998-10-02", "age": 24 } "
And response body should be "201 Created"

case.title: PUT Update my crocodile check response body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/my/crocodiles/12282058/" in Postman
When user executes PUT request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive information for the selected crocodile
And respose code should be "200 OK"

case.title: PATCH Update selected field on my crocodile check response body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/my/crocodiles/12282058/" in Postman
When user executes PATCH request to the given endpoint
Then the information for the selected crocodile are updated

case.title: DELETE Remove my crocodile check response body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://test-api.k6.io/my/crocodiles/12282058/" in Postman
When user executes DELETE request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive information that the selected crocodile is removed
And respose code should be "204 No Content"
step.expected: And respose code should be "200 OK"

case.title: GET all employee data check response body

step.content: Given user has opened endpoint "https://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/employees" in Postman
When user executes GET request to the given endpoint
Then user should receive list of all employee data
And response code should be 200
